I

ILogic - Interface in Core
The ILogic interface represents the logic component of a game or application.
inc_pos(float, float, float) - Method in class Core.Entities.Entity
Increments the position of the entity by the specified amounts along the x, y, and z axes.
incRotation(float, float, float) - Method in class Core.Entities.Entity
Increments the rotation of the entity by the specified amounts around the x, y, and z axes.
init() - Method in interface Core.ILogic
Initializes the logic component.
init() - Method in class Core.Managers.MouseInput
Initializes mouse input by setting up GLFW callbacks.
init() - Method in class Core.Managers.RenderManager
Initializes the RenderManager by creating and linking shaders, and setting up uniforms.
init() - Method in class Core.Managers.WindowManager
Initializes GLFW, creates a window, and sets various window hints based on configuration options.
init() - Method in class Launcher.TestGame
Initializes the game, including renderer, loader, camera, lights, and entities.
input() - Method in interface Core.ILogic
Handles user input for the logic component.
input() - Method in class Core.Managers.MouseInput
Processes mouse input to calculate displacement vector and button presses.
input() - Method in class Launcher.TestGame
Handles user input for camera movement and light adjustments.
